title: Machine Learning for Healthcare
description: Electronically stored medical imaging data is plentiful and Machine Learning algorithms can be fed with this type of dataset, to detect and uncover patterns and anomalies. In this article, I will introduce you to five machine learning projects for healthcare.Machines and algorithms can interpret imaging data just as a highly trained radiologist could identify suspicious spots on the skin, lesions, tumours and bleeding in the brain. The use of machine learning tools and platforms to help radiologists is therefore poised to grow exponentially.Also, Read – Analyze Call Records with Machine Learning using Google Cloud Platform.
